parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: New angle of the center mark

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: New size of the center mark

parameters.name: Lines
parameters.description: True displays the center mark lines, false displays the plus sign (+) at the circle center

parameters.name: DocSettings
parameters.description: True uses the default settings for this document, false does not
